Call Tracking

Camera Promo Execution



• Control Dates were the average of the previous 6 corresponding weekdays
• Camera Promo garnered over a 20% total lift in response rates compared to the control

PPC Non-Brand Landing Page Element Testing

• After identifying a lift with the 'Outfield' page layout, we began testing the individual page elements to understand which combination and organization of elements provided the most optimized experience for users to respond

• Product panels with videos produced the highest response rate when placed in the first position after the hero section

• A truncated comparison chart followed by a testimonial section performed best in the third and fourth positions on the page

• While removing third and fourth position element decreased response on desktop and tablet traffic, it produced an increased response rate on mobile traffic

• Further testing will confirm if mobile traffic prefers a lighter page with fewer overall elements

Mobile Inline Form Test

October Tests and INITIATIVES

Press down to view view what's next.

Mirror Landing Pages to Ads

• A percent of our PPC brand ads display offers for $1,500 in free equipment
• In October we'll run an experience that targets these ads with a more relevant landing page, which will extend the offer messaging they clicked on

Promo Banner Variations

• Site-wide banners and promotions make landing page testing difficult as noise from offers and urgencies affect confidence levels
• Instead, we'll focus more on new ways to execute the offers to find which method drives the highest response rates

Invoca Full Implementation

• In October we plan to refactor our call tracking, migrating from Mongoose Metrics to Invoca services
• More granular tracking, moving from 3 custom fields to 10
• A better technology platform for future growth

Vivint.com Pricing and Packages Update

• Support design and front-end initiatives to implement new pricing and package updates to website

Holiday Promotion

• Support Holiday Promotion initiatives
